home.whatDo: What would you like to do?
home.whyText: We provide a secure and reliable platform for creating and completing orders in the EVE Online universe. With our service, you can be sure that your transactions are safe, your work is recognized, and your progress is rewarded.
home.why3: Ratings and reviews to ensure trust

home.roadmapLangText: Global access with localized UI in English, Russian, and more.

home.roadmapZkillText: Automated kill verification for bounty contracts.
home.roadmapMobileText: Seamless experience on phones and tablets.
home.roadmapAnalyticsText: Insights into your performance, earnings, and activity.
home.roadmapTrustText: Enhanced rating systems to build trust between users.
home.roadmapUiText: Core UI created with routing and initial API integration.
home.roadmapBetaText: First users, bug reports, flow adjustments.

access.title: What we access
access.desc: We request limited data from your EVE Online character via ESI scopes — only what's required for platform functionality:

list.desc: basic character info: ID, name, avatar.
current system (for live contract updates and optional tracking).
your active ship type (optional, for future features).
online status (to help show availability in ops).
your ISK balance (used to create/accept contracts).

why.title: Why we use it
why.desc: We use this data only to:
list: Authenticate your EVE character and display your profile
Enable and verify in-game contracts and wallet operations
Support real-time updates and in-client interactions

no.title: What we don’t do
list: We do not read your mails, chats, assets, or PLEX
We do not use corporate wallet data unless you're an authorized admin on the platform.
We do not share or sell any of your data

storage.title: Storage & security
storage.desc: Access tokens are stored securely and automatically refreshed via OAuth. All character-related data is used strictly within EVE Board and never exposed to third parties.

sections.title: Using the platform
sections.text: By accessing EVE Board, you agree to use the platform responsibly and in accordance with these terms. If you do not accept these terms, do not use the platform.

sections.title: Accounts & access
sections.text: Access requires authentication via EVE Online. You are responsible for all actions taken under your account, including contracts you create or accept.

sections.title: Orders & payments
sections.text: All contracts are final once created or accepted. Payouts are processed through the internal wallet system. Platform fees may apply. Orders can be moderated or canceled by admins in case of abuse, fraud, or error.

sections.title: Wallet & withdrawals
sections.text: ISK earned on the platform is stored in your internal balance. Withdrawals are subject to a service commission and may require identity verification. The platform is not liable for losses due to incorrect wallet info or in-game bans.

sections.title: Conduct & restrictions
sections.text: Abusive behavior, multi-accounting, scamming, or misuse of platform features will result in suspension or permanent ban. We reserve the right to revoke access at any time.

sections.title: Uptime & availability
sections.text: We strive for stable performance but do not guarantee uptime, error-free operation, or data availability. Scheduled or unscheduled downtime may occur.

sections.title: Disputes
sections.text: If a dispute arises regarding a contract, users can submit a complaint. Disputes are reviewed manually by platform moderators. All decisions are final.

sections.title: Changes to terms
sections.text: These terms may be updated at any time. Continued use of the platform after changes implies acceptance of the updated terms.
